conversation.event: <0>speech</0> <1>Have any pure protodermis? I offer good money for it.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>45 widgets, to be exact. So how about it?</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Ah, well. Can't blame a Matoran for trying.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Thanks! I need this for an experimental fuel...</1> <2>player</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>No, I don't have any pure protodermis.</1> <2>player</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Oh, well. Come back if you get any!</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
